glossary.bad_hosts_enabled: Hosts with error state and alerts enabled
glossary.active_hosts_ok: Hosts which recently applied changes successfully
glossary.active_hosts_ok_enabled: Hosts which recently applied changes successfully with alerts enabled
glossary.ok_hosts_enabled: Hosts without changes or errors, with alerts enabled
glossary.out_of_sync_hosts_enabled: Out of sync hosts with alerts enabled
glossary.pending_hosts_enabled: Hosts that had pending changes with alerts enabled
glossary.good_hosts_enabled: Hosts without errors, with alerts enabled
